TextLibrary.Text: Stolen Catapult
Necromancers in Skelheim have stolen Catapults and threaten to attack Drakenburg. You must destroy the Catapults.
Storms At Sea
Storms have been driving Sea Serpents into the Drakenburg sewers. You must clear them out.
Troll Trouble
An old Troll, Egor the Aged, has been blocking a bridge on the River Maethel, causing trouble for all who pass by. You must chase him away.
Spider Bait
Giant Spiders have infested the Ancient Grove where the Elenian Druids hold their ceremonies. If you can slay the largest of these spiders, the rest will probably leave.
Imperial Message
The Queen of Bartonia needs a message delivered to the Emperor of Selentia, far away in the Selentine capital of Enmouth.
Slavers
Some Minotaur Slavers have been harrassing the Selentine Empire. You must help drive them off.
The Marriage
You must escort the Emperor's daughter, Princess Serephine, to the Trarg where she is to wed the leader of the Horse Tribes, Utrarg of Trarg.
Imperial Reply
You must take the Emperor's reply back to Queen Gwendholyn in Bartonia.
Knightly Orders
You must seek out and train with each of the 5 Orders of Agarian Knights and then choose an Order to join.
Bats in the Belfry
Bats have infested a tower in the Royal Crypt. You must travel there and chase them away.
The Missive
A sealed message must be delivered to Sir Albion in Siria. This is an important message, and you may be in danger as you travel there.
Rogue Skeleton

A Skeleton has been terrorizing the peasants near the Royal Crypt in western Theira. Nobody is sure where it came from, though whispers say that a cult of necromancers are to blame. You must find the Skeleton and lay it to rest.
Darkhunter
Undead are beginning to appear all over Agaria. You must travel south over the mountains in search of a warrior named Darkhunter - a specialist in combat against the Undead.
Helping Hand
Darkhunter is heading out to the Skell Marshes to track down an evil Sorcerer. He requires some help to hold the Sorcerer's minions at bay.
The Prisoner
You must escort a captive Sorcerer to the Red Tower - the home citadel of the Riverguard, located in Maethelburg.
Rescue Mission
A band of Orcs recently traveled over the Hammer Pass, took some prisoners and headed back to Kor. You must try to catch them and rescue the prisoners.
None Shall Pass
A strange Undead creature - a Liche - is blocking access to the forest of Silvermyr. The Wood Elves need help fighting it.
Dwarven Caravan
A Dwarf by the name of Khalkus has requested your aid in getting a caravan of supplies safely through Agaria.
Good Tidings
You must deliver news of Dugog's demise to Queen Gwendholyn in Bartonia.
Patrol Duty
The Elenian Knights regularly patrol the forests of Agaria, looking for signs of trouble. You must perform one such patrol, traveling from Bartonia to Elenia and back again.
Harpy Infestation
Harpies have infested the Old Outpost again - an ancient Selentine Tower on the edge of the forest that was overrun by Elenian archers 100 years ago. You must clean out the Tower.
Beneath Gildor
Giant Rats have been plaguing Gildor. You must seek out the largest of these rats and slay it.
Ogre Twins
A pair of Ogres have built a tower to the east. You must go and chase them back over the mountains into Kor.
Dragonsearch
The Green Dragon who lives in the mountains nearby has not been seen for some time. You must travel to his cave and see if he is there.
Father and Son
A young Squire named Erik is seeking your help. His father, Lord Michael, was captured by Orcs as they traveled past the Ogre's Tower. You must travel there and rescue him.
Lord of the Swamp
Every year the Elves of Silvermyr deliver a gift to Embraxus, the Dragon of the Alfland Swamp. They have asked you to take the gift for them this year.
Family Reunion
Your father has requested your presence in Siria. You must travel there and meet him.
Practice Dummy
You must learn some basic combat against a Practice Dummy.
Advanced Combat
You must learn some more advanced combat by practicing against a Young Knight.
Spider Meat
Drong the Ogre is looking for someone to hunt down some exotic creatures for him to eat.
Troll Meat
Drong the Ogre is after some more food - this time it is a Troll.
Wyvern Meat
Drong the Ogre is after some more food - this time it is a Wyvern.
Ogre Meat
Drong the Ogre has a special request for you. There is something very unusual that he would like you get for him to eat.
Serpent Meat
Drong the Ogre would like you fetch him a serpent to eat, but not just any serpent will do...
Beacon Fires
Lord Bane's servants have been snuffing out the beacon fires in the passes. You must capture new Fire Elementals and re-light them.
Antidote
Neehi the Goblin will pay 150 Gold for each Wasp Stinger you bring him.
Incoming!
The Orc Tribes are building Gobshooters again, and the Dwarves are concerned it may lead to war. You must destroy their latest creation.
Reagent Hunt
Neehi, the Goblin Trader, needs a brave person to go and collect some spell components.
Tit for Tat
Neehi, the Goblin Merchant, needs you to travel over the mountains and exchange some items for him.
Reassembly
Neehi the merchant needs you to take the limb and the axe-head over the mountains to be assembled into an axe.
Tribal Chaos
With the death of Dugog, the Orc tribes have been thrown into chaos. You must travel to 4 Orc villages and defeat their leaders to quiet them down.
Lord of Orcs
You must travel deep into Kor to meet with Gruulkar, the Great Orc, Lord of Kor. You must then convince Gruulkar to tell you why the Orcs are taking prisoners.
Ogre Tactics
The Ogres in the south are getting restless. Somebody needs to travel down there and sort them out.
Ogre Magic
You must stop any further threat from the Ogres by defeating their leader.
War Council
You must try to stop Gruulkar from gathering the hordes and going to war in Northern Kor.
The Gobshooter
Gruulkar is building a new weapon. You must find it and destroy it.
Gruulkar
You must travel south and defeat Gruulkar himself.
Dragontrap
You must dispose of a Dragon that has been caught in a Dragontrap north of Dhun-Kor.
Waking Kelthurax
You must attempt to wake Kelthurax who slumbers beneath the Dragonrealm. He is the oldest Dragon in Etheria.
The Mechataur
You must travel to the Hornburg to confront the Mechataur. Hopefully, you will discover who or what is behind the attacks on your homeland.
Frost Hunt
You must travel to the lair of the Frost Dragon, Chilblain, to see if he is still there.
Flame Hunt
You must search the lair of Umbra the Flame Dragon, to see if there is any sign of where the Dragons have gone.
Swamp Hunt
You must travel to the lair of Morass, the Swamp Dragon, to see if you can find any clues about where the Dragons have gone.
More Hunting
You must continue hunting around the Dragonrealm, searching for anything that might be a clue as to the Dragons' whereabouts.
Dwarven Heirloom
An ancient Dwarven heirloom was stolen from one of the previous caravans attacked by Ogres. Khalkus would like you to retrieve it.
The Worm Turns
A giant worm has been seen in Eastern Kor. It is said to have swallowed a huge treasure.
The Sting
You must defeat two Giant Scorpions that live in a cave north of Dhun-Kor. They have been harrassing miners from the city on their way to the mountains.
Slave Caravan
Some Orcs were sighted traveling though Northern Kor with a group of slaves they captured in Agaria. You must stop them.
Crazy Goblin
A crazy Goblin thief has stolen a relic from the Temple of Ymorgia in Gruuldok. He was seen last near White Skull. You must find him and retrieve the relic.
Gnoll in a Hole
You have found a Gnoll hiding in a hole in the ground. You must try and find out what is wrong, and then help him.
Gnoll Hunters
You must find three more Assassins that are after Patch the Gnoll.
Master Assassin
You must tie up one final loose end to help Patch the Gnoll.
Prized Helm
You must travel to Arik's Arena to battle the Minotaur King and recover a magical Helm.
Sacred Flame
You must journey to the Volcano and help the Firewalkers to relight their Sacred Flame.
Gnoll Raiders
You must chase away the Gnolls that have been desecrating the Pike.
Endless War
Rogue Minotaur tribes are causing havok in the Realms of War. Track them down and stop them.
Arioc Blockade
The pass to Ar has been blocked by Hill Giants. You must confront them, chase them away and clear a path.
The Invitations
You must deliver an invitation to two Giants, Jarl and Jotun. They have been invited to attend a tournament in Tusk.
Fresh Eyes
You must somehow replace the Orb you stole from the Elves of Silvermyr.
Jarl's Hammer
Jotun the Fire Giant has stolen Jarl's Hammer. You must take it back and return it to its rightful owner.
Jotun's Helm
Jarl the Frost Giant has stolen Jotun's Helm. You must find and return it.
Jarl's Cloak
Jotun the Fire Giant has stolen Jarl's Cloak. You must take it back and return it to its rightful owner.
Jotun's Boots
Jarl the Frost Giant has stolen Jotun's Boots. You must find them and return them.
Brotherly Love
You must try to put an end to Jarl and Jotun stealing each others' things.
Red-Axe
You must seek out the Minotaur, Red-Axe, to train you and improve your skills with the axe.
Trial of the Wyvern
You must travel to the Wyverns' Roost, slaying a Wyvern and studying its combat technique to learn more about using an axe.
Trial of the Worm
You must travel to the Worm Cave, slaying a Sandworm and studying its combat technique to learn more about using an axe.
Trial of the Scorpion
You must travel to the Scorpions' Cave, slay a Giant Scorpion while studying its combat technique to learn more about using an axe.
Trial of Blood
You must complete the final trial in your effort to become a Master of the Axe.
Slave Trail
You have followed the trail of the Orcish Slavers to a huge Horned Temple. You must enter the Temple to learn more.
Trial by Fire
You must undergo a ritual cleansing by the Minotaur Firewalkers. Once you have done this, they will agree to talk to you.
Horns of Sartek
You must challenge a Minotaur Tribe in an attempt to reclaim the Horns of Sartek.
Eye of Sartek
You must obtain the Eye of Sartek from the Elves and return it to the Horned Temple.
Tail of Sartek
You must defeat a Minotaur Slaver who wields the legendary Tail of Sartek as a whip. Then you must return the Tail to the Horned Temple.
Tooth of Sartek
You must obtain the Tooth of Sartek from the Gnoll Chieftain in Hyaan and return it to Tauron.
Spine of Sartek
You must travel into Southern Kor and find an Ogre Mage that has made the Spine of Sartek into a war banner.
Ribs of Sartek
Somewhere in the Realms of War a Minotaur King has hidden the Ribs of Sartek. You must find them.
Crest of Sartek
You must find a Knight in the Borderlands who has had the Crest of Sartek mounted onto his helm, then return to Tauron with the Crest.
Skull of Sartek
You must steal the final piece of Sartek, his huge skull, from Minogoth in the Horned Citadel of Ohtar.
Ice Statues
A Medusa has been attacking travelers near Iceguard Keep and turning them into Ice Statues. You must stop her.
Children of Ragnar
Sensing the unrest in this region, young Dragons - children of Ragnar the Ancient Frost Dragon - have been moving down to the coast. You must chase them away.
Harpy Queen
Harpies from the Hagstone have been traveling down into the High Elven lands. You must confront their Queen to stop them.
Dark Dealings
Dark Dwarven caravans have been sighted leaving for Lord Bane's Citadel. You must stop them from trading with him.
Spawn of Bane
Arboleth have been sighted near the Lake of Blood. You must drive them away.
Bloodstone
You must search for signs of Elistara's lost dragon, Crystal, at the Bloodstone.
Dragontracks
You must continue your search through the Realms of Death for Elistara's lost Dragon.
Condolences
You must accompany Elistara to the Realm of Dragons.
Sign of Dragons
You must hunt down the lost dragons and find out what has happened to them.
Dragon in Chains
You must help Flicker to finally find his mother.
Gold of Morass
You must search Morass' Lair for treasure. You must be cautious. There are Swamp Dragons about!
Gold of Umbra
You must search Umbra's Lair for treasure. You must be cautious. There are Flame Dragons about!
Gold of Chilblain
You must search Chilbain's Lair for treasure. You must be cautious. There are Frost Dragons about!
Royal Summons
You have been summoned to appear before Queen Ehlanna at Ehlariel.
Elven Forge
Undead have taken over the Ice Crystal Mine near Iceguard Keep. You must help take back the mine.
Elven Captives
Elven Warriors have been taken captive by the Undead. You must rescue them before it is too late.
The Baneguard
You must travel to Iceguard Keep to pick up the trail left by the Undead in order to rescue the remaining captives.
Gornak's Gap
You must cross the mountains into the Realms of Death in search of Lord Bane.
Northern Tundra
You must travel to the Ruins of Ylarie in the Northern Tundra and seek help from the High Elves who guard the remaining two passes into Lord Bane's realm.
Ylarie Defense
You must help the High Elves defend Ylarie against waves of Undead attackers.
Skullguard Keep
You must help the High Elves to recapture Skullguard Keep.
The Future
You must gather some herbs for the High Elven Mages who need them to cast a spell of farseeing.
Three Skulls
You must find and defeat the three Generals of Lord Bane's army, evil Sorcerors who are preparing his army of Undead.
Bane's Citadel
You must enter Bane's Citadel and make your way to his throne room, ready to confront him.
The Final Battle
You must confront and defeat Lord Bane.
Follow the Sword
You must 'follow your sword' in search of a great source of power.
Wolf Pack
A pack of wolves have been terrorizing the Elves at Tirianin. You must chase the wolves away.
Lost Cubs
You must rescue the wolf cubs from being sacrificed by the Doomknight.
Blessings
You must bless the homeland of the wolves. To do this, you must first obtain the Elvenstone from Queen Ehlanna.
Distant Rumor
You must help Darkhunter search for an old acquaintance in Northern Kor.
Seeking Advice
Darkhunter wants to travel to Maethelburg and meet with Lord Greythane.
Liandra's Offer
Darkhunter wants to go and meet an old acquaintance and would like you to come with him.
Liandra's Return
Darkhunter has received another summons to meet with Liandra. You must accompany him once again.
Ashes to Ashes
You must accompany Darkhunter as he returns Liandra's ashes to her home in Maethelburg.
Granite
You must find some granite for Drong to eat.
Volcanic Rock
You must travel to the Volcano with Drong and help him find some tasty Volcanic Rock. The Volcano is home to many Fire Elementals.
Sandstone
You must travel to the beach at Tirianin to help find sandstone for Drong to eat. The beach is guarded by Sea Serpents.
Diamond
You must travel to the Lake of Blood to help find diamonds for Drong to eat. The Dark Dwarves are fiercely protective of their diamonds.
First Gear
Khalkus would like you to help him find part of a device called the Great Machine.
Second Gear
You must help Khalkus find the second part of the Great Machine.
Third Gear
You must help Khalkus find the third piece of the Great Machine.
Fourth Gear
You must help Khalkus gather the fourth piece of the Great Machine.
Fifth Gear
You must help Khalkus find the fifth piece of the Great Machine.
Assembly Required
You must finally help Khalkus put the Great Machine together.
Patch's Hoard
Patch invites you to Hyaan to see his treasure.
Ill-Gotten Gains
Track down the thief who stole Patch's treasure.
The Vault
You must travel to Dhun-Kor with Khalkus and Patch to help build a vault for Patch's treasure.
Secret Message
Princess Serephine receives a secret message from a friend at Enmouth asking for help. You must travel to Enmouth to help Serephine's friend.
Shotgun Wedding
You must travel to The Trarg and rescue Princess Serephine.
Imperial Legion
Emperor Selentius has sent a legion of Imperial Guards to search for Princess Serephine and take her home to Enmouth. Tread cautiously.
Age of Honor
Sunspear wishes to talk with you about battling a Frost Giant.
Seeking Death
Sunspear wishes to observe you fighting an Arboleth.
A Worthy Foe
Help Sunspear choose the final foe that he wishes to face.
